org.atmosphere.websocket
Interface WebSocketStreamingHandler

All Superinterfaces:
WebSocketHandler
public interface WebSocketStreamingHandler
extends WebSocketHandler

A Streaming Interface for WebSocket. When implemented, the WebSocketProcessor will invoke this class instead of reading bytes in memory.

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand
